did.unittitle: Kentucky Theatre (movie theater), 214 East Main, interior; lobby standee to promote "Blonde Captive"; no information on the movie is available, but it could be "Africa Specks" (1930) also narrated by Lowell Thomas; also visible: standee for "The State Theatre's Popular Baby Contest" and posters for "Movie Crazy" (1932), "Love Me Tonight" (1932), and "Horse Feathers" (1932)
